Detailed Description

MGAttrib is an abstract class which represents a system attribute element.

Currently main subclasses of MGAttrib are MGGLAttrib for OpenGL attributes.

Member Function Documentation

size_t MGAttrib::dlist_name (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Obtain display list name.

0(null) means this gel need not to be displayed. dlist_name() of MGAttrib is null.

Reimplemented from MGGel.
